name: 蘇倚德
objective:
本課程具焦國際智慧財產重要及新興議題，以具體個案討論為中心，讓同學習得比較法及跨國智慧財產法律知識。

This course focuses on important and emerging issues in international intellectual property. Through case-based discussions, students will acquire knowledge of comparative law and transnational intellectual property law.
schedule:
01. Introduction
02. UPC system
03. UPC system
04. UPC system
05. EUTM litigations
06. EUTM litigations
07. Exhaustion doctrine
08. Exhaustion doctrine
09. Middle terme disscusions
10. Customs Protection
11. NPE & Forum shopping in US
12. NPE & Forum shopping in EU
13. Compulsory Licensing
14. Compulsory Licensing
15. AI & IP 
16. AI & IP
17. AI & IP
18.Final terme discussions

The course schedule and topics may be adjusted according to the course situation.
materials: Class material will be given in class or posted online.
